name: MONORACER
description:
Goal

Fight against 4 other drivers for domain of your vehicle and attempt to spend the most time on the lap before you're attacked.

Features
  • Play alone against 3 robots.
  • Play with 3 friends by a LAN connection
How To Play

Use the arrow keys to move.
Use the SPACE key to attack
Move inside the track while avoiding the obstacles to gather points. Try to fill you bar before the other ones do.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2019

Music from https://filmmusic.io
"Welcome to the Show" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com)
